items.title: WATCH:  ‘Demonic’ sea lions have Californians concerned
items.description: Along the California coast, sea lions are getting poisoned by toxic algae -- causing them to act in a way some describe as "demonic."

items.title: 'Extreme alarm': Democrats demand answers after Signal chat firestorm
items.description: Top Senate Democrats wrote a letter to President Donald Trump seeking more information about reports that his cabinet members used Signal to discuss "...

items.title: Zelenskyy threatens 'new measures' against Moscow if proposed partial ceasefire fails
items.description: The success of an apparent agreement between Ukraine and Russia to pause naval and energy infrastructure attacks will depend on Moscow, Zelenskyy said...

items.title: WATCH:  Toddler crushes social media cookie challenge
items.description: This toddler didn't hesitate when she noticed her mom was the only one without a cookie.

items.title: WATCH:  The story behind the video of emotional 3-year-old hearing he's his dad’s best friend
items.description: Three-year-old Micah started to cry when a Lewis Capaldi song came on in the car, and his dad took the moment to tell him how much he loved him.
